meanings.sent1: The limpsiest rope couldn't hold the heavy box.
meanings.sent2: She chose the limpsiest fabric for her dress, and it tore easily.
meanings.sent3: The limpsiest excuse for not doing homework was that the dog ate it.
meanings.sent4: His argument was the limpsiest thread in the tapestry of ideas presented.
meanings.sent5: The limpsiest twig in the forest snapped under the weight of the squirrel.

meanings.definition: Showing a lack of energy or enthusiasm
meanings.sent1: The limpsiest response to the exciting news was a half-hearted smile.
meanings.sent2: After a long day at work, she felt her limpsiest when asked to go for a run.
meanings.sent3: Even the limpsiest joke managed to make him chuckle.
meanings.sent4: Her enthusiasm for the project was the limpsiest flame in the room.
meanings.sent5: The limpsiest cheer from the crowd barely reached the stage.

meanings.definition: Moving with a limp or uneven gait
meanings.sent1: The limpsiest dog in the park struggled to keep up with the others.
meanings.sent2: He noticed the limpsiest walk of the injured bird as it hopped along.
meanings.sent3: The limpsiest dance move in the performance brought unexpected applause.
meanings.sent4: Her steps were the limpsiest beats in the rhythm of the music.
meanings.sent5: The limpsiest runner in the race crossed the finish line with determination.
